reviews.review: The thing i like most about this game is its replay ability. the game is always enjoyable, weather its playing survivor with friends, or killer if you have none. heck maybe you'll even brave the dark dimension of randoms. the game is always getting constant updates and bug fixes, so it will keep you coming back. the one problem is that some changes make something as useless as discord nitro, while others are the best thing since sliced bread. the perk system in the game is very intriguing. its honestly astonishing the amount you can diversify your play stile with 4 little perks. and that's not to mention the different play stiles of the killers. over all i would highly recommend this to any body with friends or a liking to multiplayer horror. great game, 9/10

Напишу так Бежал Бегал И буду Бежать
Пока Не сотру свои пальцы в порошок
no. god no.

game was fun at one point but now all you get are either sweats with 10,000 hours or blatant hackers who know the dev's don't give two shits about stopping them. the game is unfun regardless of which side you play as the game is unbalanced beyond belief. as killer you only have a few characters that are viable and they are also the ones that require the least skill to play. as survivor your forced to use the same 6 perks and play as a 4 stack or u just lose because randoms are almost always useless. this game used to be fun. it may not have been balanced at any point but as time has gone on those problems have become more apparent and numerous, while the devs have made it clear they dont give a fuck how there players feel and hide all deceent to almost mandatory perks behind a dlc paywall. unless you want to grind for months waiting for them to add to the ingame store which is all luck dependent anyway, with most of the necissary perks coming up less the once every 3-4months. they will strait up cancel partnerships with content creators who dont suck up to them or so much as think about criticising a decision they make. Game could be great but a shitty group of arrogant developers have destroyed this game.
Only buy if this game becomes free. otherwise its a waste of time and money

this game has a very toxic community.
 If you run some set ups you will get horrible comments at the end of most games. 
There are set ups that if you counter it you will also get horrible comments if you do. 
The community forces you to play they way they want or force you to not play the game
last even if you do not play face camping or tunneling you still are told you did and have to see horrible comments toward that or if they force you to do one of them either by staying by a hook or getting unhooked and try to get a flashlight save instead of getting away forcing you to down them again makes you a bad person.
The game concept is fun but the community has too many toxic players to make it fun.
I would recommend the game if they had a way to stop the toxic chat and people finding you on other platforms to talk trash.

  游戏中的博弈还是挺精彩的，如果当成娱乐向和朋友一起玩的话当我没说。
  胆小的人刚开始玩这游戏的话挺吓人的，玩多了就好了，问题不大，我也是个胆子小的人，最开始玩就是恐怖游戏，玩到后来变成了竞技游戏或者是跟朋友开黑的娱乐游戏。

It starts with a new player discovering Dead by Daylight for the first time.

At first, there's so much to learn, and the game is so full of potential, since it's a one-of-a-kind game with such an unique asymmetrical style of gameplay. There's so many different characters and perks, all the characters have unique designs and mechanics. And the cosmetics look stunning! All locked off in the market, of course, but the free skins and characters are still cool!

In the first few matches, the player experiences the thrill of the hunt- being chased or chasing down survivors. It's bloodpumping. It's exciting! And when they win a match, it's almost liberating.

Then after a few hours of the game, the initial excitement begins to wear off. The player becomes smarter and realizes that their teammates aren't exactly optimal in most of their time. More of the killer matches they play begin to culminate in losses or ties. This realization slowly builds into frustration. After their frustration begins to build up into bottled anger, and after that? Everything feels more annoying. Irritating. Now their "inexperienced teammates" become "useless noobs", and "experienced survivors" become "bully squads" and "toxic meta players". 

Of course, the player calms down a bit and then comes to one of the two possible conclusions: 1) This game is toxic and maybe they shouldn't play, or at least take a break. 2) Maybe it's just because they don't have a good character or set of perks.

So of course, they then look towards the alluring market and use real money to buy a new killer or survivor.

The cycle repeats: the player gets a rush of excitement in playing a new character, then slowly builds up frustration as the excitement wears off until they decide they need to buy a new character to enjoy the game... all until when there are finally no more new characters to buy.

Except, oh wait! There will ALWAYS be more! Because the devs realize that their source of income is not through maintaining a balanced game and listening to the community, but by releasing more skins and characters through DLC packs! 

And the cycle continues- a cycle of naivety, frustration, toxicity, and addiction that preys on gaining new players and locking them in.
very good game yeees

Le concept du jeu est intéressant, et du contenu nouveau et plutôt varié est ajouté régulièrement, ce qui est un bon point. Cependant, le jeu est malheureusement marqué au fer rouge par une communauté en partie toxique de manière totalement gratuite, un matchmaking parfois douteux (Vous pouvez débuter avec un personnage et tomber contre de très bons joueurs, qui maîtrise très bien leur personnage), et parfois des bugs, indépendants de votre connexion, qui vous feront souvent perdre. Mais le plus gros du problème est que les développeurs n'essaye pas d'y changer quoi que ce soit. En conclusion, le jeu n'est pas totalement mauvais, mais souffre du fait que les développeurs privilégie le contenu à la qualité basique de l'expérience de jeu.
if you like getting tunneled, faced camped n bmed then this is your game <3
